markdown:
**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 53 **Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33) **Prerequisites** [Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139) --- Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies. Make a ranged Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike. **Critical Success** The target is pushed 10 feet away from you.
**Success** The target is pushed 5 feet away from you.
**Failure** The target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round.
name: Forceful Shot

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Forceful Shot Single Action Source PFS Guide pg. 53 Archetype Swordmaster Prerequisites Swordmaster Dedication --- Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies. Make a ranged Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike. Critical Success The target is pushed 10 feet away from you. Success The target is pushed 5 feet away from you. Failure The target is flat-footed for 1 round.
